UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Parent_C.AddTo.Des: Activates custom controls for the instigating Agent, activating if the highest priority.
Activates custom controls for the instigating Agent, activating if the highest priority.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Add: Activates custom controls for the instigating Agent, activating if the highest priority.
Activates custom controls for the instigating Agent, activating if the highest priority.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.AddT: Activates custom controls for the instigating Agent, activating if the highest priority.
Activates custom controls for the instigating Agent, activating if the highest priority.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Aimi: Applies a multiplier to the player's movement speed while aiming.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Shoo: Applies a multiplier to the player's movement speed while shooting.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Move: Applies a multiplier to the player's movement speed.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Turn: Applies a multiplier to the player's sprint turn speed.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Mov: Applies a multiplier to the player’s movement speed while they are aiming.
Applies a multiplier to the player’s movement speed while they are shooting.
Applies a multiplier to the player’s movement speed.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Turn: Applies a multiplier to the player’s turn speed.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Parent_C.RemoveOnE: Automatically remove the device from a player, upon elimination.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Rem: Automatically remove the device from a player, upon elimination.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Remo: Automatically remove the device from a player, upon elimination.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.bSh: Constrains the NPC movement to the forward rotation axis of the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Con: Constrains the player movement to the forward rotation axis of the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Parent_C.RemoveFro: Deactivates custom controls for the instigating Agent.
Deactivates custom controls for the instigating Agent.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Rem: Deactivates custom controls for the instigating Agent.
Deactivates custom controls for the instigating Agent.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Remo: Deactivates custom controls for the instigating Agent.
Deactivates custom controls for the instigating Agent.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Parent_C.AddToPlay: Determines if the device is activated for valid Players on phase start.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Add: Determines if the device is activated for valid Players on phase start.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.AddT: Determines if the device is activated for valid Players on phase start.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Parent_C.EnabledDu: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Ena: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Enab: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Tar: Determines when the player aims toward their target when they have a target.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Targ: Determines when the player turns toward their target when they have a target.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Twin:
Determines where the Player faces when using a mouse.
Target Cursor: The Player will aim towards the cursor.
Dial Aiming: The mouse will behave similarly to an analog stick.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Cro: Determines whether crouching should be disabled, if the player should crouch when the crouch button is pressed, or if they should crouch when receiving downward movement input.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Jum: Determines whether jumping should be disabled, if the player should jump when the jump button is pressed, or if they should jump when receiving upward movement input.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Req: Determines whether or not line of sight is required in order for a target to be valid.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Requ: Determines whether or not line of sight is required in order for a target to be valid.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Parent_C.AffectsCl: Determines which Classes can be affected by the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Aff: Determines which Classes can be affected by the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Affe: Determines which Classes can be affected by the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Parent_C.AffectsTe: Determines which Teams can be affected by the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Aff: Determines which Teams can be affected by the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Affe: Determines which Teams can be affected by the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Fixe: Force the player to face this angle if Facing Direction is set to Fixed
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Parent_C.InvertCla: If FALSE, only the selected Class is affected by the device. If TRUE, all Classes except the selected Class are affected by the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Inv: If FALSE, only the selected Class is affected by the device. If TRUE, all Classes except the selected Class are affected by the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Inve: If FALSE, only the selected Class is affected by the device. If TRUE, all Classes except the selected Class are affected by the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Parent_C.InvertTea: If FALSE, only the selected Team is affected by the device. If TRUE, all Teams except the selected Team are affected by the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Inv: If FALSE, only the selected Team is affected by the device. If TRUE, all Teams except the selected Team are affected by the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Inve: If FALSE, only the selected Team is affected by the device. If TRUE, all Teams except the selected Team are affected by the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Turn: If true, overrides Turn Speed Multiplier while the player is aiming.
If true, overrides Turn Speed Multiplier while the player is shooting.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Loc: Locks the player facing direction while aiming.
Locks the player facing direction while shooting.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Faci:
Movement: The Player will face in the direction they move.
Fixed: The Player will face the direction specified from the Fixed Facing Angle.
Twin Stick: The Player location of the mouse cursor on screen or the angle of the desired aim rotation when using a gamepad.
Multiple control modes may be present at a time, but only the highest priority mode is “Active”.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Pri: Multiple control modes may be present at a time, but only the highest priority mode is “Active”.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Prio: Multiple control modes may be present at a time, but only the highest priority mode is “Active”.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Sca: Scales the target’s calculated weight, reducing the final value based upon their distance from you.  If disabled, angle to target does not affect target prioritization.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Scal: Scales the target’s calculated weight, reducing the final value based upon their distance from you.  If disabled, angle to target does not affect target prioritization.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Sca: Scales the target’s calculated weight, reducing the final value based upon their distance from you. If disabled, distance to target does not affect target prioritization.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Scal: Scales the target’s calculated weight, reducing the final value based upon their distance from you. If disabled, distance to target does not affect target prioritization.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Tar: Should the device itself be valid for target selection?  Only functions in edit mode.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Targ: Should the device itself be valid for target selection?  Only functions in edit mode.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Bas: Targeting prioritization assigned to Creatures.  A value of 0 will prevent creatures from being targeted.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Base: Targeting prioritization assigned to Creatures.  A value of 0 will prevent creatures from being targeted.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Bas: Targeting prioritization assigned to Players.  A value of 0 will prevent players from being targeted.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Base: Targeting prioritization assigned to Players.  A value of 0 will prevent players from being targeted.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Bas: Targeting prioritization assigned to Vehicles.  A value of 0 will prevent vehicles from being targeted.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Base: Targeting prioritization assigned to Vehicles.  A value of 0 will prevent vehicles from being targeted.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Rang: The distance in cm from the Player that targets are considered valid.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Targ: The distance in cm from the Player that targets are considered valid.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Tar: The distance in cm from the player that targets are considered valid while aiming.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Ran: The distance in cm from the player that targets are considered valid.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Tar: The duration in seconds the player character attempts to face their target after each ranged action.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Targ: The duration in seconds the player character attempts to face their target after each ranged action.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Tar: The range in degrees based upon which direction the player is facing, that targets are considered valid while aiming.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Ran: The range in degrees based upon which direction the player is facing, that targets are considered valid.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Rang: The range in degrees based upon which direction the player is facing, that targets are considered valid.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Targ: The range in degrees based upon which direction the player is facing, that targets are considered valid.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Tar: The vertical distance in cm from the player that targets are considered valid while aiming.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_Sidescroller_C.Ran: The vertical distance in cm from the player that targets are considered valid.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Targ: When enabled, players will auto-select a target based on distance, angle, and target priorities.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CustomControls_ThirdPerson_C.Auto: Whether to automatically fire the weapon when using the controller right stick.
